author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new particle gun to simulate single hadrons with admixture of pi/k/p and antiparticles with defined probabilities depending on momentum and rapidity

#### PR validation:

Tested using runTheMatrix workflows and a cfg file in the test area

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim74 Add a new particle gun to simulate single hadrons with admixture of pi/k/p and antiparticles with defined probabilities
